title: Miscellany of geometrical works
author: Euclid
description: Contents: Sefer Uḳlidos: Hebrew translation of Euclid's Elements from the Arabic (ff. 1-89). Sefer Teʾodosyus ba-kadur: Hebrew translation of Theodosius of Bythinia's Sphaerics from the Arabic (ff. 90-107r). Sefer Melaʾus be-temunat ha-kaduriyot: Hebrew translation of Menelaus of Alexandria's Sphaericorum libri III (ff. 107v-113v).
